5731.verse: وَأَهْدِيَكَ|And I will guide you|149|188|17813$إِلَىٰ|to|53|132|118$رَبِّكَ|your Lord|82|161|1322$فَتَخْشَىٰ|so you would fear.'`|154|194|17814$

5732.verse: فَأَرَٮٰهُ|Then he showed him|156|245|17815$ٱلْأَيَةَ|the sign|73|250|17816$ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ|the great.|91|180|11391$

5737.verse: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ|So Allah seized him|146|160|17819$نَكَالَ|(with) an exemplary punishment|232|260|17820$ٱلْأَخِرَةِ|(for) the last|106|134|978$وَٱلْأُولَىٰٓ|and the first.|107|121|16270$

5739.verse: ءَأَنتُمْ|Are you|71|84|1260$أَشَدُّ|a more difficult|119|145|711$خَلْقًا|creation|74|100|10392$أَمِ|or|38|64|9003$ٱلسَّمَآءُ‌ۚ|the heaven.|100|126|12745$بَنَـٰهَا|He constructed it?|143|156|17821$

5741.verse: وَأَغْطَشَ|And He darkened|132|170|17824$لَيْلَهَا|its night|74|150|17825$وَأَخْرَجَ|and brought out|127|203|17826$ضُحَـٰهَا|its brightness.|114|152|17827$

5743.verse: أَخْرَجَ|He brought forth|130|176|6338$مِنْهَا|from it,|68|159|246$مَآءَهَا|its water|79|170|17829$وَمَرْعَـٰهَا|and its pasture,|125|170|17830$

5744.verse: وَٱلْجِبَالَ|And the mountains,|149|338|17753$أَرْسَـٰهَا|He made them firm,|149|338|17831$

5745.verse: مَتَـٰعًا|(As) a provision|124|208|2141$لَّكُمْ|for you|67|234|207$وَلِأَنْعَـٰمِكُمْ|and for your cattle.|150|234|17832$

5748.verse: وَبُرِّزَتِ|And will be made manifest|192|228|12981$ٱلْجَحِيمُ|the Hell-Fire|101|172|12982$لِمَن|to (him) who|105|176|1356$يَرَىٰ|sees,|64|100|1440$

5752.verse: وَأَمَّا|But as for|85|92|269$مَنْ|(him) who|86|100|76$خَافَ|feared|69|83|1574$مَقَامَ|standing|76|90|16477$رَبِّهِۦ|(before) his Lord,|135|149|392$وَنَهَى|and restrained|115|129|17836$ٱلنَّفْسَ|his soul|76|83|4994$عَنِ|from|54|300|1663$ٱلْهَوَىٰ|the vain desires,|130|376|4542$

5758.verse: كَأَنَّهُمْ|As though they,|127|133|944$يَوْمَ|(the) Day|84|96|1057$يَرَوْنَهَا|they see it,|97|110|12781$لَمْ|not|42|54|63$يَلْبَثُوٓاْ|they had remained|143|156|15746$إِلَّا|except|65|78|86$عَشِيَّةً|an evening|92|98|17841$أَوْ|or|41|287|154$ضُحَـٰهَا|a morning thereof.|142|388|17827$

5728.verse: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,

5729.verse: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.

5730.verse: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself

5731.verse: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"

5732.verse: And he showed him the greatest sign,

5734.verse: Then he turned his back, striving.

5735.verse: And he gathered [his people] and called out

5736.verse: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."

5737.verse: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].

5738.verse: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].

5739.verse: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.

5740.verse: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.

5741.verse: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.

5742.verse: And after that He spread the earth.

5743.verse: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,

5744.verse: And the mountains He set firmly

5745.verse: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.

5746.verse: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -

5747.verse: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,

5748.verse: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -

5749.verse: So as for he who transgressed

5750.verse: And preferred the life of the world,

5751.verse: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.

5752.verse: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,

5753.verse: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.

5754.verse: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?

5755.verse: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?

5756.verse: To your Lord is its finality.

5757.verse: You are only a warner for those who fear it.

5758.verse: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.
